title: Retire VncSHarp/VncSharpNG
author: farosch
body_snippet:
The original VNCSharp has been out of development since about 2018.
This is the reason for a lot of issues that we cannot fix, mainly these:
- #227 
- #274 
- #444
- #461 
- #494 
- #573 
- #640 
- #1368
- #1494 
- #1905

We should consider switching to another VNC implementation, e.g. [VncClient](https://github.com/MarcusWichelmann/MarcusW.VncClient)

iterations.description: VncSharpCore is an outdated or problematic dependency that needs to be replaced or removed to improve stability and maintainability.

notes:
AI triage (gemini): VncSharpCore is an outdated or problematic dependency that needs to be replaced or removed to improve stability and maintainability.
Approach: Research alternative VNC client implementations, integrate a suitable replacement library into the project, and refactor existing VNC connection logic and UI components to use the new implementation.
